events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to return the product and get a refund because it doesn't meet my expectations.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning return and refund.
Assigning the refund request to the customer support agent specialized in reimbursements.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I see you'd like to return your order and request a refund. Iâ€™m here to help you with this process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product is not as described on the website, so I would like to return it.
Thank you for the information. You can ship the product back to us using the return label we will email you shortly. Once we receive it, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you. I will send the product back as soon as I get the return label.
We received your returned product and processed your refund today. You should see the amount credited to your account within a few days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent you a short survey to hear your feedback about the refund experience and our customer service.
